versos: (hewn) Isaiah 9:10 - "The bricks have fallen down, but we will rebuild with dressed stones; the sycamores have been felled, but we will replace them with cedars.";;;
(polluted) Malachi 1:7 - "By offering polluted food upon my altar.";;;
(steps) Psalm 37:23 - The Lord makes firm the steps of the one who delights in him.;;;
(marriage) "Let marriage be held in honor among all, and let the marriage bed be undefiled, for God will judge the sexually immoral and adulterous." - Hebrews 13:4;;;

(queen) "The queen of the South will rise at the judgment with this generation and condemn it; for she came from the ends of the earth to listen to Solomon's wisdom, and now something greater than Solomon is here." - Matthew 12:42 NIV;;;
(dibon) Isaiah 15:2 - "dibon goes up to its temple, to its high places to weep; Moab wails over Nebo and Medeba. Every head is shaved and every beard cut off.";;;

(smiteth) Isaiah 11:4 - "But with righteousness shall he judge the poor, and reprove with equity for the meek of the earth: and he shall smite the earth with the rod of his mouth, and with the breath of his lips shall he slay the wicked.";;;
(wait) Psalm 27:14 - "wait for the Lord; be strong, and let your heart take courage; wait for the Lord";;;
(guile) 1 Peter 2:1 - "Wherefore laying aside all malice, and all guile, and hypocrisies, and envies, and all evil speakings,";;;
(selleth) Proverbs 31:24 - She maketh fine linen, and selleth it; and delivereth girdles unto the merchant.;;;
(keepeth) Proverbs 19:8 - "He that getteth wisdom loveth his own soul: he that keepeth understanding shall find good.";;;
(quit) Philippians 4:13 - "I can do all things through Christ who strengthens me.";;;
(pay) Romans 13:7 - "Give to everyone what you owe them: If you owe taxes, pay taxes; if revenue, then revenue; if respect, then respect; if honor, then honor.";;;
(punished) 1 Peter 2:14 - "or to governors as sent by him to punish those who do wrong and to praise those who do right.";;;
(tooth) "As a man turns a garment in the cold or a vinegar on soda, so a sluggard turns a tooth in his mouth." - Proverbs 26:2;;;
(wound) Proverbs 18:8 - "The words of a gossip are like choice morsels; they go down to the inmost parts.";;;
(owner) 1 Corinthians 6:19 - "Or do you not know that your body is a temple of the Holy Spirit who is in you, whom you have from God, and that you are not your own";;;

(push) Isaiah 49:23 - "Kings will be your foster fathers, and their queens your nursing mothers. They will bow down before you with their faces to the ground; they will lick the dust at your feet. Then you will know that I am the Lord; those who hope in me will not be disappointed.";;;
